text: Elizabeth Bruenig (n√©e Stoker; born December 6, 1990), also known as Liz Bruenig, is an American writer. She works as an opinion writer for The New York Times. She worked as an opinion writer and editor for The Washington Post, writing about ethics, politics, theology, and economics. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:American political writers Category:American political commentators Category:American editors Category:Journalists from Texas
title: Elizabeth Bruenig
